description: The 13-year-old heroine of the series. She`s a happy fun-loving girl who likes to make people happy. Her life turns messy when Brigadoon appears in the sky and Monomakia Bronte start to attack her. She is an orphan and her real identity may shed some light on why she is targeted. She was dropped at the door of a tenement house; Grandma and her husband adopted her. Apparently, Marin carries something in her DNA called Creis, which Brigadoon needs to survive. She soon begins to fall in love with Melan and tries understand his thoughts and feelings. She hates war and fighting and she doesn`t understand why the other Monomakia are fighting against each other.After her grandmother died she fell into deep depression and she was still getting over the loss of her grandfather. She falls out of depression after she learns that she could stop all this fighting by going to brigadoon so she left to save both worlds. It is later revealed that she is not the true ceris but is her ancestor even after learning that she still wants to hep melan. sometime trough the series she loses her eyesight but is able to see again when she is wearing cosmos and is able to change into anthing she sees.When marin goes to brigadoon a second time no one remembers her and melan ingures her very badly but he remember her again when she kisses him they then try to stop the renegade. she later is killed by the renegade but is brought back to life by the day of pasca and it even restored her eye sight.When she returns to earth with melan the portal between brigadoon and earth is closing and won`t reopen intil another 100 years. Marin crys, begging for melan to take her with him and that she loves him then they share a kiss.
name: Asagi Marin
